hero.title: Professional Academic Editing
hero.subtitle: Professional editing and formatting for theses, dissertations, books, journal articles, and training materials.

steps.title: Get Started
steps.body: Share project details. I confirm availability and provide a clear estimate.

steps.title: Expert Editing
steps.body: Customized edits based on project needs.

steps.title: Review & Finalize
steps.body: Receive tracked changes and an editor memo. Revise with confidence.

featuredTestimonial.quote: Ahnie was a lifesaver. She helped me edit my final dissertation and my presentation. She was thorough, professional, and timely. I had an “editing emergency” right before my dissertation defense and I called Ahnie and she responded immediately and saved the day. I don't think I could have done it without her expertise.
featuredTestimonial.author: L. Nickols
